entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
